name: SafeGuard
description:
Game mode
This game is a first person shooting game, players could choose different characters to join match, cooperate to occupy the stronghold.
weapons
Pistol,7 kinds of rifles, grenade, smoke, 4 kinds of optical sights
characters
assault, medic, support
Bots
medical class bot, support class bot
Support items
Medical box, Ammo box
Other features
The game supports up to 32 Bots , automatically assign teams, player could command Bot.
